metadata.title: Marine Data From Lao Hu Tan Station of China
metadata.description: The data cover the quasi-real time data from Lao Hu Tan Station of china, including sea temperature and salinity, wave height, wave period, visibility, air temperature, air pressure, precipitation, wind speed and wind direction from January 2010 to December 2010. The format is an ASCII(character) format. There is one data file for each month. Code identification, decoding, format check, code transform, standardization, primary quality control, visual inspection, calibration, etc, are carried out before the creation of standard format datasets. The quality control procedure includes range check, illegal code check, station identification check, etc.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To collect and archive marine data from Chinese coastal stations.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Monthly

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None

Distribution liability: Data Owner

FGDC metadata date: 20110921

FGDC metadata standard: FGDC Biological Data Profile of the Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
